title: sa_kālidāsa-meghadūta-acc-vallabhadeva
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaś cit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārapramattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasminn adrau kati cid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītvā māsān kanakavalayabhraṃśariktaprakoṣṭhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āṣāḍhasya praśamadivase megham āśliṣṭasānuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaprakrīḍāpariṇatagajaprekṣaṇīyaṃ dadarśa</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ ketakādhānahetor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīmūtena svakuśalamayīṃ hārayiṣyan pravṛttim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmārtā hi praṇayakṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkarāvartakānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yācñā vandhyā varam adhiguṇe nādhame labdhakāmā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃtaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāhyodyānasthitaharaśiraścandrikādhautaharmyā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvām ārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīm udgṛhītālakāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prekṣiṣyante pathikavanitāḥ pratyayād āśvasantyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāle kāle bhavati bhavatā yasya saṃyogam etya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas toyagṛdhnuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>garbhādhānasthiraparicayā nūnam ābaddhamālāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ cāvaśyaṃ divasagaṇanātatparām ekapatnīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avyāpannām avihatagatir drakṣyasi bhrātṛjāyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥpātapraṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kartuṃ yac ca prabhavati mahīm ucchilindhrām avandhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tac chrutvā te śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ mānasotkāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ā kailāsād bisakisalayacchedapātheyavantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃpatsyante nabhasi bhavato rājahaṃsāḥ sahāyāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mārgaṃ tāvac chṛṇu kathayatas tvatprayāṇānukūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdeśaṃ me tadanu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃ svid ity unmukhībhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭotsāhaś cakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalehān</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuṣkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveśasya viṣṇoḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayy āyattaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvilāsānabhijñaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītisnigdhair janapadavadhūlocanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyaḥsīrotkaṣaṇasurabhi kṣetram āruhya mālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ cit paścād pravalaya gatiṃ bhūya evottareṇa</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvām āsārapraśamitavanopaplavaṃ sādhu mūrdhnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakṣyaty adhvaśramaparigataṃ sānumān āmrakūṭaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kṣudro 'pi prathamasukṛtāpekṣayā saṃśrayāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpte mitre bhavati vimukhaḥ kiṃ punar yas tathoccaiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nūnaṃ yāsyaty amaramithunaprekṣaṇīyām avasthāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthitvā tasmin vanacaravadhūbhuktakuñje muhūrtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>toyotsargadrutataragatis tatparaṃ vartma tīrṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jambūṣaṇḍapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā haritakapiśaṃ kesarair ardharūḍhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvirbhūtaprathamamukulāḥ kandalīś cānukaccham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dagdhāraṇyeṣv adhikasurabhiṃ gandham āghrāya corvyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utpaśyāmi drutam api sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śuklāpāṅgaiḥ sanayanajalaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāṇḍucchāyopavanavṛtayaḥ ketakaiḥ sūcibhinnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nīḍārambhair gṛhabalibhujām ākulagrāmacaityāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayy āsanne phalapariṇatiśyāmajambūvanāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃpatsyante katipayadinasthāyihaṃsā daśārṇāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣāṃ dikṣu prathitavidiśālakṣaṇāṃ rājadhānīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yat tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nīcairākhyaṃ girim adhivases tatra viśrāmahetos</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvatsamparkāt pulakitam iva prauḍhapuṣpaiḥ kadambaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaḥ paṇyastrīratiparimalodgāribhir nāgarāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uddāmāni prathayati śilāveśmabhir yauvanāni</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśrāntaḥ san vraja vananadītīrajātāni siñcann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udyānānāṃ navajalakaṇair yūthikājālakāni</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṇḍasvedāpanayanarujāklāntakarṇotpalānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chāyādānāt kṣaṇaparicitaḥ puṣpalāvīmukhānām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vakraḥ panthā yad api bhavataḥ prasthitasyottarāśāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho mā sma bhūr ujjayinyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyuddāmasphuritacakitais tatra paurāṅganānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lolāpāṅgair yadi na ramase locanair vañcito 'si</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīcikṣobhastanitavihagaśreṇikāñcīguṇāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃsarpantyāḥ skhalitasubhagaṃ darśitāvartanābheḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirvindhyāyāḥ pathi bhava rasābhyantaraḥ saṃnipatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>strīṇām ādyaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ vibhramo hi priyeṣu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>veṇībhūtapratanusalilāṃ tām atītasya sindhuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇḍucchāyāṃ taṭaruhatarubhraṃśibhir jīrṇaparṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saubhāgyaṃ te subhaga virahāvasthayā vyañjayantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kārśyaṃ yena tyajati vidhinā sa tvayaivopapādyaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāpyāvantīn udayanakathākovidagrāmavṛddhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvoddiṣṭām anusara purīṃ śrīviśālāṃ viśālām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svalpībhūte sucaritaphale svargiṇāṃ gāṃ gatānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śeṣaiḥ puṇyair hṛtam iva divaḥ kāntimat khaṇḍam ekam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrghīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭitakamalāmodamaitrīkaṣāyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānim aṅgānukūlaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jālodgīrṇair upacitavapuḥ keśasaṃskāradhūmair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandhuprītyā bhavanaśikhibhir dattanṛttopahāraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harmyeṣv asyāḥ kusumasurabhiṣv adhvakhinnāntarātmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nītvā rātriṃ lalitavanitāpādarāgāṅkiteṣu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartuḥ kaṇṭhacchavir iti gaṇaiḥ sādaraṃ dṛśyamāṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṇyaṃ yāyās tribhuvanaguror dhāma caṇḍeśvarasya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūtodyānaṃ kuvalayarajogandhibhir gandhavatyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>toyakrīḍāniratayuvatisnānatiktair marudbhiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apy anyasmiñ jaladhara mahākālam āsādya kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthātavyaṃ te nayanaviṣayaṃ yāvad abhyeti bhānuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kurvan saṃdhyābalipaṭahatāṃ śūlinaḥ ślāghanīyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āmandrāṇāṃ phalam avikalaṃ lapsyase garjitānām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pādanyāsakvaṇitaraśanās tatra līlāvadhūtai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratnacchāyākhacitavalibhiś cāmaraiḥ klāntahastāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veśyās tvatto nakhapadasukhān prāpya varṣāgrabindūn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āmokṣyanti tvayi madhukaraśreṇidīrghān kaṭākṣān</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścād uccairbhujataruvanaṃ maṇḍalenābhilīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāṃdhyaṃ tejaḥ pratinavajapāpuṣparaktaṃ dadhānaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nṛttārambhe hara paśupater ārdranāgājinecchāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāntodvegastimitanayanaṃ dṛṣṭabhaktir bhavānyā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gacchantīnāṃ ramaṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ tatra naktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ruddhāloke narapatipathe sūcibhedyais tamobhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saudāminyā kanakanikaṣasnigdhayā darśayorvīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>toyotsargastanitamukharo mā sma bhūr viklavās tāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ kasyāṃ cid bhavanavalabhau suptapārāvatāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītvā rātriṃ ciravilasanāt khinnavidyutkalatraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭe sūrye punar api bhavān vāhayed adhvaśeṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandāyante na khalu suhṛdām abhyupetārthakṛtyāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin kāle nayanasalilaṃ yoṣitāṃ khaṇḍitānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāntiṃ neyaṃ praṇayibhir ato vartma bhānos tyajāśu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāleyāsraṃ kamalavadanāt so 'pi hartuṃ nalinyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyāvṛttas tvayi kararudhi syād analpābhyasūyaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gambhīrāyāḥ payasi saritaś cetasīva prasanne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāyātmāpi prakṛtisubhago lapsyate te praveśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt tasyāḥ kumudaviśadāny arhasi tvaṃ na dhairyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>moghīkartuṃ caṭulaśapharodvartanaprekṣitāni</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ kiṃ cit karadhṛtam iva prāptavānīraśākhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hṛtvā nīlaṃ salilavasanaṃ muktarodhonitambam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasthānaṃ te katham api sakhe lambamānasya bhāvi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jñātāsvādaḥ pulinajaghanāṃ ko vihātuṃ samarthaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvanniṣyandocchvasitavasudhāgandhasaṃparkapuṇyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>srotorandhradhvanitasubhagaṃ dantibhiḥ pīyamānaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīcair vāsyaty upajigamiṣor devapūrvaṃ giriṃ te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīto vāyuḥ pariṇamayitā kānanodumbarāṇām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra skandaṃ niyatavasatiṃ puṣpameghīkṛtātmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṣpāsāraiḥ snapayatu bhavān vyomagaṅgājalārdraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakṣāhetor navaśaśibhṛtā vāsavīnāṃ camūnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atyādityaṃ hutavahamukhe saṃbhṛtaṃ tadd hi tejaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jyotirlekhāvalayi galitaṃ yasya barhaṃ bhavānī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraprītyā kuvalayapadaprāpi karṇe karoti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhautāpāṅgaṃ haraśaśirucā pāvakes taṃ mayūraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścād adrigrahaṇagurubhir garjitair nartayethāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārādhyaivaṃ śaravaṇabhuvaṃ devam ullaṅghitādhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhadvandvair jalakaṇabhayād vīṇibhir muktamārgaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyālambethāḥ surabhitanayālambhajāṃ mānayiṣyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>srotomūrtyā bhuvi pariṇatāṃ rantidevasya kīrtim</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayy ādātuṃ jalam avanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthum api tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prekṣiṣyante gaganagatayo dūram āvarjya dṛṣṭīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekaṃ muktāguṇam iva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām uttīrya vraja paricitabhrūlatāvibhramāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pakṣmotkṣepād uparivilasatkṛṣṇaśāraprabhāṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kundakṣepānugamadhukaraśrīmuṣām ātmabimbaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pātrīkurvan daśapuravadhūnetrakautūhalānām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmāvartaṃ janapadam adhaśchāyayā gāhamānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣetraṃ kṣatrapradhanapiśunaṃ kauravaṃ tad bhajethāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājanyānāṃ śitaśaraśatair yatra gāṇḍīvadhanvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhārāpātais tvam iva kamalāny abhyavarṣan mukhāni</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hitvā hālām abhimatarasāṃ revatīlocanāṅkāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandhuprītyā samaravimukho lāṅgalī yāḥ siṣeve</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtvā tāsām abhigamam apāṃ somya sārasvatīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>antaḥsvacchas tvam api bhavitā varṇamātreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād gaccher anukanakhalaṃ śailarājāvatīrṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jahnoḥ kanyāṃ sagaratanayasvargasopānapaṅktim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaurīvaktrabhrukuṭiracanāṃ yā vihasyeva phenaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śambhoḥ keśagrahaṇam akarod indulagnormihastā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni pūrvārdhalambī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaṃ ced acchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayes tiryag ambhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayā sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syād asthānopanatayamunāsaṃgam evābhirāmā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīnānāṃ surabhitaśilaṃ nābhigandhair mṛgāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyā eva prabhavam acalaṃ prāpya gauraṃ tuṣāraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vakṣyasy adhvaśramavinayane tasya śṛṅge niṣaṇṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śobhāṃ ramyāṃ trinayanavṛṣotkhātapaṅkopameyām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ced vāyau sarati saralaskandhasaṃghaṭṭajanmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bādhetolkākṣapitacamarīvālabhāro davāgniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arhasy enaṃ śamayitum alaṃ vāridhārāsahasrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āpannārtipraśamanaphalāḥ saṃpado hy uttamānām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye tvāṃ muktadhvanim asahanāḥ kāyabhaṅgāya tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darpotsekād upari śarabhā laṅghayiṣyanty alaṅghyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tān kurvīthās tumulakarakāvṛṣṭihāsāvakīrṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ke vā na syuḥ paribhavapadaṃ niṣphalārambhayatnāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra vyaktaṃ dṛṣadi caraṇanyāsam ardhendumauleḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaśvat siddhair upahṛtabaliṃ bhaktinamraḥ parīyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmin dṛṣṭe karaṇavigamād ūrdhvam uddhūtapāpāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalpante 'sya sthiragaṇapadaprāptaye śraddadhānāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śabdāyante madhuram anilaiḥ kīcakāḥ pūryamāṇāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃraktābhis tripuravijayo gīyate kiṃnarībhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirhrādī te muraja iva cet kandarāsu dhvaniḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃgītārtho nanu paśupates tatra bhāvī samastaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāleyādrer upataṭam atikramya tāṃs tān viśeṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>haṃsadvāraṃ bhṛgupatiyaśovartma yat krauñcarandhram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenodīcīṃ diśam abhisares tiryagāyāmaśobhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śyāmaḥ pādo baliniyamanābhyudyatasyeva viṣṇoḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā cordhvaṃ daśamukhabhujocchvāsitaprasthasaṃdheḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kailāsasya tridaśavanitādarpaṇasyātithiḥ syāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṅgocchrāyaiḥ kumudaviśadair yo vitatya sthitaḥ khaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāśībhūtaḥ pratiniśam iva tryambakasyāṭṭahāsaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utpaśyāmi tvayi taṭagate snigdhabhinnāñjanābhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyaḥkṛttadviradadaśanacchedagaurasya tasya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>līlām adreḥ stimitanayanaprekṣaṇīyāṃ bhavitrīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṃsanyaste sati halabhṛto mecake vāsasīva</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hitvā nīlaṃ bhujagavalayaṃ śambhunā dattahastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍāśaile yadi ca viharet pādacāreṇa gaurī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaṅgībhaktyā viracitavapuḥ stambhitāntarjalo 'syāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sopānatvaṃ kuru sukhapadasparśam ārohaṇeṣu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāvaśyaṃ janitasalilodgāram antaḥpraveśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>neṣyanti tvāṃ surayuvatayo yantradhārāgṛhatvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tābhyo mokṣas tava yadi sakhe gharmalabdhasya na syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍālolāḥ śravaṇaparuṣair garjitair bhāyayes tāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hemāmbhojaprasavi salilaṃ mānasasyādadānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurvan kāmāt kṣaṇamukhapaṭaprītim airāvaṇasya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhunvan vātaiḥ sajalapṛṣataiḥ kalpavṛkṣāṃśukāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cchāyābhinnaḥ sphaṭikaviśadaṃ nirviśeḥ paravataṃ tam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyotsaṅge praṇayina iva srastagaṅgādugūlāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punar alakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāram uccairvimānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktājālagrathitam alakaṃ kāminīvābhravṛndam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyutvantaṃ lalitavanitāḥ sendracāpaṃ sacitrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃgītāya prahatamurajāḥ snigdhagambhīraghoṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antastoyaṃ maṇimayabhuvas tuṅgam abhraṃlihāgrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāsādās tvāṃ tulayitum alaṃ yatra tais tair viśeṣaiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>haste līlākamalam alakaṃ bālakundānuviddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītā rodhraprasavarajasā pāṇḍutām ānanaśrīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cūḍāpāśe navakuravakaṃ cāru karṇe śirīṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasyāṃ yakṣāḥ sitamaṇimayāny etya harmyasthalāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyotiśchāyākusumaracanāny uttamastrīsahāyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsevante madhu ratiphalaṃ kalpavṛkṣaprasūtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvadgambhīradhvaniṣu śanakaiḥ puṣkareṣv āhateṣu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra strīṇāṃ priyatamabhujāliṅganocchvāsitānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgaglāniṃ suratajanitāṃ tantujālāvalambāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvatsaṃrodhāpagamaviśadaiś cotitāś candrapādair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyālumpanti sphuṭajalalavasyandinaś candrakāntāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>netrā nītāḥ satatagatinā yad vimānāgrabhūmīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālekhyānāṃ navajalakaṇair doṣam utpādya sadyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaṅkāspṛṣṭā iva jalamucas tvādṛśā yatra jālair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūmodgārānukṛtinipuṇaṃ jarjarā niṣpatanti</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nīvībandhocchvasanaśithilaṃ yatra yakṣāṅganānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsaḥ kāmād anibhṛtakareṣv ākṣipatsu priyeṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arcistuṅgān abhimukham api prāpya ratnapradīpān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hrīmūḍhānāṃ bhavati viphalapreraṇaś cūrṇamuṣṭiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatyutkampād alakapatitair yatra mandārapuṣpaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kḷptacchedyaiḥ kanakakamalaiḥ karṇavibhraṃśibhiś ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muktālagnastanaparimalaiś chinnasūtraiś ca hārair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naiśo mārgaḥ savitur udaye sūcyate kāminīnām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>matvā devaṃ dhanapatisakhaṃ yatra sākṣād vasantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaś cāpaṃ na vahati bhayān manmathaḥ ṣaṭpadajyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabhrūbhaṅgaprahitanayanaiḥ kāmilakṣyeṣv amoghais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyārambhaś caturavanitāvibhramair eva siddhaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāgāraṃ dhanapatigṛhān uttareṇāsmadīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrāl lakṣyaṃ tad amaradhanuś cāruṇā toraṇena</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyopānte kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā vardhito me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hastaprāpyastavakanamito bālamandāravṛkṣaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāpī cāsmin marakataśilābaddhasopānamārgā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>haimaiḥ syūtā kamalamukulaiḥ snigdhavaiḍūryanālaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyās toye kṛtavasatayo mānasaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na dhyāsyanti vyapagataśucas tvām api prekṣya haṃsāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasyās tīre nicitaśikharaḥ peśalair indranīlaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍāśailaḥ kanakakadalīveṣṭanaprekṣaṇīyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madgehinyāḥ priya iti sakhe cetasā kātareṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prekṣyopāntasphuritataḍitaṃ tvāṃ tam eva smarāmi</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>raktāśokaś calakisalayaḥ kesaraś cātra kāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāsannau kuravakavṛter mādhavīmaṇḍapasya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekaḥ sakhyās tava saha mayā vāmapādābhilāṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāṅkṣaty anyo vadanamadirāṃ dohadacchadmanāsyāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tanmadhye ca sphaṭikaphalakā kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūle naddhā maṇibhir anatiprauḍhavaṃśaprakāśaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tālaiḥ śiñjadvalayasubhagair nartitaḥ kāntayā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yām adhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ebhiḥ sādho hṛdayanihitair lakṣaṇair lakṣaṇīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvāropānte likhitavapuṣau śaṅkhapadmau ca dṛṣṭvā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣāmacchāyaṃ bhavanam adhunā madviyogena nūnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūryāpāye na khalu kamalaṃ puṣyati svām abhikhyām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā sadyaḥ kalabhatanutāṃ śīghrasaṃpātahetoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍāśaile prathamakathite ramyasānau niṣaṇṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arhasy antarbhavanapatitāṃ kartum alpālpabhāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khadyotālīvilasitanibhāṃ vidyudunmeṣadṛṣṭim</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tanvī śyāmā śikharadaśanā pakvabimbādharauṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhye kṣāmā cakitahariṇaprekṣaṇī nimnanābhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śroṇībhārād alasagamanā stokanamrā stanābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā tatra syād yuvativiṣaye sṛṣṭir ādyeva dhātuḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīm ivaikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍhotkaṇṭhāguruṣu divaseṣv eṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ vānyarūpām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nūnaṃ tasyāḥ prabalaruditocchūnanetraṃ bahūnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niḥśvāsānām aśiśiratayā bhinnavarṇādharauṣṭham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hastanyastaṃ mukham asakalavyakti lambālakatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>indor dainyaṃ tvadupasaraṇakliṣṭakānter bibharti</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āloke te nipatati purā sā balivyākulā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>matsādṛśyaṃ virahatanu vā bhāvagamyaṃ likhantī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛcchantī vā madhuravacanāṃ śārikāṃ pañjarasthāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kac cid bhartuḥ smarasi nibhṛte tvaṃ hi tasya priyeti</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utsaṅge vā malinavasane somya nikṣipya vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madgotrāṅkaṃ viracitapadaṃ geyam udgātukāmā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantrīr ārdrā nayanasalilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃ cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayam api kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śeṣān māsān gamanadivasaprastutasyāvadher vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinyasyantī bhuvi gaṇanayā dehalīdattapuṣpaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃyogaṃ vā hṛdayanihitārambham āsvādayantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyeṇaite ramaṇaviraheṣv aṅganānāṃ vinodāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādye baddhā virahadivase yā śikhā dāma hitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāpasyānte vigalitaśucā yā mayonmocanīyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sparśakliṣṭām ayamitanakhenāsakṛt sārayantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇḍābhogāt kaṭhinaviṣamād ekaveṇīṃ kareṇa</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>savyāpārām ahani na tathā khedayed viprayogaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅke rātrau gurutaraśucaṃ nirvinodāṃ sakhīṃ te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>matsaṃdeśaiḥ sukhayitum ataḥ paśya sādhvīṃ niśīthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām unnidrām avaniśayanāsannavātāyanasthaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādhikṣāmāṃ virahaśayane saṃnikīrṇaikapārśvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prācīmūle tanum iva kalāmātraśeṣāṃ himāṃśoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>matsaṃyogaḥ katham upanamet svapnajo 'pīti nidrām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākāṅkṣantīṃ nayanasalilotpīḍaruddhāvakāśām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niḥśvāsenādharakisalayakleśinā vikṣipantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuddhasnānāt paruṣamalakaṃ nūnam āgaṇḍalambam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇa iva mayā sārdham icchāratair yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām evoṣṇair virahaśayaneṣv asrubhir yāpayantīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pādān indor amṛtaśiśirāñjālamārgapraviṣṭān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvaprītyā gatam abhimukhaṃ saṃnivṛttaṃ tathaiva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakṣuḥ khedāt sajalagurubhiḥ pakṣmabhiś chādayantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sābhre 'hnīva sthalakamalinīṃ na prabuddhāṃ na suptām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jāne sakhyās tava mayi manaḥ saṃbhṛtasneham asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>itthaṃbhūtāṃ prathamavirahe tām ahaṃ tarkayāmi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vācālaṃ māṃ na khalu subhagaṃmanyabhāvaḥ karoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyakṣaṃ te nikhilam acirād bhrātar uktaṃ mayā yat</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā saṃnyastābharaṇam abalā pelavaṃ dhārayantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śayyotsaṅge nihitam asakṛd duḥkhaduḥkhena gātram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvām apy asraṃ navajalamayaṃ mocayiṣyaty avaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaḥ sarvo bhavati karuṇāvṛttir ārdrāntarātmā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ruddhāpāṅgaprasaram alakair añjanasnehaśūnyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyādeśād api ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayy āsanne nayanam uparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mīnakṣobhākulakuvalayaśrītulām eṣyatīti</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāmo vāsyāḥ kararuhapadair mucyamāno madīyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktājālaṃ ciraparicitaṃ tyājito daivagatyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhogānte mama samucito hastasaṃvāhanānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāsyaty ūruḥ sarasakadalīstambhagauraś calatvam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin kāle jalada dayitā labdhanidrā yadi syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anvāsyaināṃ stanitavimukho yāmamātraṃ sahasva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā bhūd asyāḥ praṇayini mayi svapnalabdhe kathaṃ cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ kaṇṭhacyutabhujalatāgranthi gāḍhopagūḍham</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām utthāpya svajalakaṇikāśītalenānilena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāśvastāṃ samam abhinavair jālakair mālatīnām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyudgarbhe nihitanayanāṃ tvatsanāthe gavākṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaktuṃ dhīrastanitavacanair māninīṃ prakramethāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartur mitraṃ priyam avidhave viddhi mām ambuvāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatsaṃdeśān manasi nihitād āgataṃ tvatsamīpam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śrāmyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandrasnigdhair dhvanibhir abalāveṇimokṣotsukāni</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity ākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvām utkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya saṃbhāvya caiva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śroṣyaty asmāt param avahitā somya sīmantinīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃ cid ūnaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām āyuṣmān mama ca vacanād ātmanā copakartuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brūyād evaṃ tava sahacaro rāmagiryāśramasthaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvāśāsyaṃ sulabhavipadāṃ prāṇinām etad eva</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgenāṅgaṃ tanu ca tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāsreṇāsradravam aviratotkaṇṭham utkaṇṭhitena</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uṣṇocchvāsaṃ samadhikatarocchvāsinā dūravartī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkalpais te viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śabdākhyeyaṃ yad api kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇe lolaḥ kathayitum abhūd ānanasparśalobhāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'tikrāntaḥ śravaṇaviṣayaṃ locanānām agamyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvām utkaṇṭhāviracitapadaṃ manmukhenedam āha</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śyāmāsv aṅgaṃ cakitahariṇaprekṣite dṛṣṭipātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṇḍacchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ varhabhāreṣu keśān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadīvīciṣu bhrūvilāsān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hantaikasthaṃ kva cid api na te bhīru sādṛśyam asti</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvām ālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiḥ śilāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvad icchāmi kartum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asrais tāvan muhur upacitair dṛṣṭir ālipyate me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krūras tasminn api na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mām ākāśapraṇihitabhujaṃ nirdayāśleṣahetor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhāyās te katham api sati svapnasaṃdarśaneṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktāsthūlās tarukisalayeṣv asruleśāḥ patanti</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhittvā sadyaḥ kisalayapuṭān devadārudrumāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ye tatkṣīrasrutisurabhayo dakṣiṇena pravṛttāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvaspṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhaved aṅgam ebhis taveti</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃkṣipyeran kṣaṇa iva kathaṃ dīrghayāmās triyāmāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvāvasthāsv ahar api kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itthaṃ cetaś caṭulanayane durlabhaprārthanaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāḍhoṣmābhiḥ kṛtam aśaraṇaṃ tvadviyogavyathābhiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nanv ātmānaṃ bahu vigaṇayann ātmanā nāvalambe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat kalyāṇi tvam api sutarāṃ mā gamaḥ kātaratvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasyātyantaṃ sukham upanataṃ duḥkham ekāntato vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīcair gacchaty upari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāpānto me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māsān anyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścād āvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tam ātmābhilāṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśaraccandrikāsu kṣapāsu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūyaś cāha tvam api śayane kaṇṭhalagnā purā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nidrāṃ gatvā kim api rudatī sasvanaṃ viprabuddhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāntarhāsaṃ kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataś ca tvayā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvaṃ mayeti</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasmān māṃ kuśalinam abhijñānadānād viditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā kaulīnād asitanayane mayy aviśvāsinī bhūḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snehān āhuḥ kim api virahahrāsinas te hy abhogād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iṣṭe vastuny upacitarasāḥ premarāśībhavanti</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kac cit somya vyavasitam idaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyākhyātuṃ na khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ tarkayāmi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niḥśabdo 'pi pradiśasi jalaṃ yācitaś cātakebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyuktaṃ hi praṇayiṣu satām īpsitārthakriyaiva</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='KMdV_111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etat kṛtvā priyam anucitaprārthanāvartmano me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sauhārdād vā vidhura iti vā mayy anukrośabuddhyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iṣṭān deśān vicara jalada prāvṛṣā saṃbhṛtaśrīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā bhūd evaṃ kṣaṇam api ca te vidyutā viprayogaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
